leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

queries: [WEB] bayesian optimization for materials science github
[WEB] reinforcement learning for crystal design github
[WEB] active learning algorithms for materials discovery github

tools.name: SUMMIT
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for urban driving in massive mixed traffic for autonomous driving research
tools.detailed_description: SUMMIT is a high-fidelity simulator for urban driving that generates massive mixed traffic scenarios. It is designed to support the development and testing of autonomous driving algorithms, particularly reinforcement learning agents, by providing a realistic and complex environment.

tools.name: SLAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential Learning App for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: SLAMD (Sequential Learning App for Materials Discovery) is a tool designed to facilitate the discovery of new materials through sequential learning and Bayesian optimization techniques. It provides an interface for researchers to apply active learning strategies to materials science problems.

tools.name: GCPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete SE(3)-equivariant perceptron network for 3D graph learning
tools.detailed_description: GCPNet is a deep learning architecture designed for 3D graphs, specifically targeting protein structure analysis. It utilizes SE(3)-equivariant convolutions to learn geometry-complete representations, making it suitable for tasks like protein structure prediction and refinement.

tools.name: PROPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse modeling tool for material parameter estimation in fire dynamics
tools.detailed_description: PROPTI is a Python-based interface tool that couples simulation models (like FDS) with optimization algorithms to solve inverse problems, specifically for estimating material parameters in fire dynamics simulations.

tools.name: LLMatDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous Materials Discovery framework using Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: LLMatDesign is a framework that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to autonomously design and discover new materials. It integrates LLMs with domain-specific knowledge and tools to generate and evaluate material candidates.

tools.name: PyChemia
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for materials discovery, structure search, and data mining
tools.detailed_description: PyChemia is a Python library for materials structural search, data mining, and ab-initio calculations. It provides tools for manipulating crystal structures and interfacing with DFT codes.

tools.name: transformer_rl
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning with Transformers for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A repository evaluating the use of Reinforcement Learning combined with Transformer-based models for generative molecular design.

tools.name: rlmolecule
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning library for material and molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to apply reinforcement learning techniques specifically to the optimization of materials and molecular structures.

tools.name: IRNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Residual Regression Framework for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose deep residual regression framework designed to aid in the discovery of new materials by predicting properties or inverse design.

tools.name: MDN-GAN
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse modeling framework for microstructural materials design
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Mixture Density Networks (MDNs) for inverse modeling in the design of microstructural materials.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO), allowing for optimization on Riemannian manifolds, applicable in robotics and scientific domains.

tools.name: paccmann_generator
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models for molecular design (PaccMann^RL)
tools.detailed_description: Generative models for transcriptomic-driven or protein-driven molecular design using reinforcement learning, part of the PaccMann project.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization integration for Unity simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Unity asset that interfaces with BoTorch to perform Bayesian optimization within Unity simulations, enabling human-in-the-loop or simulation-based optimization.

tools.name: protosearch
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for new materials from DFT and crystal prototypes
tools.detailed_description: Software for active learning of new materials, utilizing DFT calculations and crystal structure prototypes to accelerate discovery.

tools.name: ALLM
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning for Accelerated Design of Layered Materials
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing Active Learning strategies specifically for the accelerated design and discovery of layered materials.

tools.name: nextorch
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental design and Bayesian optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python/PyTorch library for experimental design and Bayesian optimization, facilitating efficient search in scientific experiments.

tools.name: Chemeleon-Zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of generative AI models for materials design
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting a menagerie of generative AI models specifically designed for materials science applications, facilitating the generation and design of new materials.

tools.name: IM2ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Design of Materials by Multi-objective Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the inverse design of materials using Multi-objective Differential Evolution (MODE), enabling optimization of material properties towards specific targets.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A collection of transformer-based language models trained on protein sequences (UniRef, BFD) to capture biophysical properties and structure, enabling various downstream prediction tasks in biology.

tools.name: MolDQN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Molecule Optimization via Deep Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the MolDQN algorithm for optimizing molecular properties using deep reinforcement learning, facilitating target-oriented molecular generation.

tools.name: vsi2tif
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for cellSens VSI microscopy images to pyramidal TIFF
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to convert whole slide images (WSI) from the proprietary Olympus cellSens VSI format to standard pyramidal TIFF format, facilitating microscopy data processing and analysis.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for noisy optimization and experiment planning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for optimization algorithms in materials science and chemistry, providing a suite of datasets and emulators for simulating experimental campaigns.

tools.name: AtomGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Pretrained Transformer Models for Materials Design
tools.detailed_description: A library providing generative pretrained transformer models specifically tailored for materials design tasks, enabling the generation of crystal structures and material compositions.

tools.name: EDBO
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for optimizing chemical reactions and materials processing conditions using Bayesian Optimization, designed to assist experimentalists in navigating complex parameter spaces.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization with Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation of Bayesian Global Optimization with Gaussian Processes, widely used for parameter tuning and experimental design in scientific research.

tools.name: oiffile
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Olympus image files (OIF and OIB)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading Olympus Image Format (OIF) and Olympus Image Binary (OIB) files, essential for processing microscopy data generated by Olympus microscopes.

tools.name: axtreme
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Ax and BoTorch frameworks for reliability and probabilistic design
tools.detailed_description: A development repository containing extensions for the Ax and BoTorch libraries, specifically tailored for the RaPiD project, facilitating advanced Bayesian optimization and reliability analysis tasks.

tools.name: EDBO+
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian reaction optimization tool for chemical synthesis
tools.detailed_description: EDBO+ (Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization) is a tool designed to assist chemists in optimizing reaction conditions for chemical synthesis, utilizing Bayesian optimization techniques to efficiently navigate the experimental space.

tools.name: Dragonfly
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian optimization library for high-dimensional parameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: Dragonfly is an open-source Python library for scalable Bayesian optimization, designed to handle high-dimensional parameter spaces and expensive objective functions, widely used in scientific experimentation and hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation framework for psychophysics and perception research
tools.detailed_description: AEPsych is a framework for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics and perception research, built on top of BoTorch and GPyTorch to enable efficient data collection and modeling using Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for deep learning model interpretability
tools.detailed_description: Summit is a visualization tool designed to scale deep learning interpretability by summarizing and visualizing activation and attribution data, helping researchers analyze and understand neural network behaviors.

tools.name: Matbench Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to benchmark and evaluate machine learning models in the context of high-throughput materials discovery. It simulates the discovery process to provide realistic performance metrics for materials stability prediction and candidate selection.

tools.name: InvertibleTrussDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning implementation for inverting structure-property maps of truss metamaterials
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep learning approach to invert the structure-property map of truss metamaterials. It serves as a solver for inverse design problems in mechanical metamaterials, enabling the generation of structures with target properties.

tools.name: VideoMetamaterials
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials via video denoising diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing video denoising diffusion models for the inverse design of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials. It treats the deformation process as a video sequence to generate material structures that exhibit desired dynamic mechanical behaviors.

tools.name: imatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid-state materials
tools.detailed_description: An image-based generative framework designed for the inverse design of solid-state materials. It leverages generative models to propose crystal structures or material compositions that meet specific target criteria.

tools.name: Dragonfly Legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy plugin for large-scale climate and urban heat island modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and plugin for modeling large-scale climate phenomena and urban heat islands. It enables the simulation of environmental factors in urban planning and building physics contexts.

tools.name: PyePAL
tools.one_line_profile: Multiobjective active learning with tunable accuracy/efficiency tradeoff
tools.detailed_description: PyePAL (Pareto-active learning) is a Python library for multiobjective active learning. It is designed to optimize materials discovery processes by balancing the tradeoff between accuracy and efficiency in exploring chemical spaces.

tools.name: dZiner
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for rational inverse design of materials
tools.detailed_description: A chemist AI agent framework designed for the rational inverse design of materials, utilizing machine learning techniques to navigate chemical space.

tools.name: BoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization library built on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for Bayesian Optimization built on PyTorch, providing a modular and easily extensible interface for composing Bayesian optimization primitives, widely used in materials science for experimental design and parameter optimization.

tools.name: MatterGen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for inorganic materials design across the periodic table that can be fine-tuned to steer the generation towards a wide range of property constraints, enabling targeted materials discovery.

tools.name: RJT-RL
tools.one_line_profile: De novo molecular design using Reversible Junction Tree and RL
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo molecular design that combines a Reversible Junction Tree representation with Reinforcement Learning to generate chemically valid molecules with optimized properties.

tools.name: Photonics-FDTD-DRL
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design of photonic crystals using deep reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the optimization and inverse design of photonic crystals utilizing deep reinforcement learning combined with FDTD simulations.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial isolate genome assembler for Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads, integrating Flye with other tools for polishing and processing.

tools.name: Lambo
tools.one_line_profile: Denoising Autoencoders for Bayesian Optimization in Protein Design
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Latent Space Bayesian Optimization (Lambo) for protein design, utilizing denoising autoencoders to accelerate the optimization process.

tools.name: MatInvent
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design using generative diffusion models with RL
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating inverse materials design by combining generative diffusion models with reinforcement learning to explore and optimize material structures.

tools.name: mat_discover
tools.one_line_profile: Materials discovery algorithm for exploring high-performance candidates in new chemical spaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing a materials discovery algorithm designed to explore high-performance candidates in new chemical spaces, utilizing adaptive design and optimization techniques.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based optimization of chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: A package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning, providing tools for reaction optimization benchmarks and strategies.

tools.name: InvDesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design framework for high-temperature superconducting materials
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the inverse design of high-temperature superconducting materials, integrating generative models, stability models, superconducting classification models, and critical temperature prediction models.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: An active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design that iteratively optimizes material generation towards desired properties.
